name: Pinetree Capital Ltd.
longDescription: Pinetree Capital Ltd is an investment and merchant banking company. It is engaged in the small-cap market with early-stage investments in resource and technology components. The company has a single reportable geographic segment, Canada. Pinetree's investment portfolio consists of investments, cash, cash equivalents, and cash due from brokers.
fulldescription: Pinetree Capital Ltd is an investment and merchant banking company. It is engaged in the small-cap market with early-stage investments in resource and technology components. The company has a single reportable geographic segment, Canada. Pinetree's investment portfolio consists of investments, cash, cash equivalents, and cash due from brokers.
fullAddress: 1965 Queen Street East,Unit 200, Toronto, ON, CA
